creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: three long lines of calligraphy, some angular and connecting; short line with signature at far L; oval relief stamp URC; square relief stamp at LL edge; mounted to thicker paper with gold flecks
markings: URC, oval relief; LLC, square relief; on back: center, in pencil: [Gozan]; on back, in pencil, various, in Japanese
title: Autumn Waters
